content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the constitutional process necessary for Loretta Lynch to be confirmed after being nominated, and explain how this process demonstrates the concept of checks and balances. Explain why the power being used in this scenario is given to the president. Describe how the qualifications of Loretta Lynch mentioned in the scenario match the role for which she has been nominated, and explain how she could influence the executive branch in her role.
